name: Tunnel Racer (One Hours Game Jam 89)
description:
This is a tiny arcade racing themed typing game made in a hour using PICO-8, for the 89nd One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'tunnels'.

Instructions

  • You control the shiny red car. Rapidly tap the left and right arrows to move between lanes.
  • Aim for the tunnels and avoid colliding with the walls.
  • Try to beat your high score!
